content.title: <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~Welcome to Ascendra!~•──◥</>
content.text:
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~Welcome to Ascendra PvE Cluster~•──◥</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">We're a laid-back, feature-packed PvE Ark Ascended server built for players who just want to enjoy the game.</>


<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">~•──◥Staff Team!~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Community Manager-Matrix</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Head Admin-Joe93</>


<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">~•──◥Progression & Perks~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">-Monthly Battlepass - COMING SOON</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">-In-game Points Shop - COMING SOON</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">-Better Breeding System</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">-Boosted Rate Weekends - COMING SOON</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">-Play2Win: Earn points for our in-game shop with your playtime - COMING SOON</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">-Automated donation system via our website -COMING SOON</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">-No wipes Friendly, helpful community</>

content.title: <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~Rates & Settings!~•──◥</>
content.text:
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~Rates and Settings~•──◥</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ x5 Harvest.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ x2 XP.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ x15 Taming Speed.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ No mating cooldown.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ x300 Egg hatching speed.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ x100 Mature Speed.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ 210 Max wild dino level.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ 266 Max wild wyvern level.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ 230 Max wild shiny dino level.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ 105 Max player level (without ascensions)</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ 0.5 Food drain.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ 0.5 Water drain.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ Flyer speed levelling enabled.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ Flyer speed levelling enabled.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ Player speed levelling enabled.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ Cave flying enabled.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ 5 Min item de-spawn timer.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ 1 Hour death cache de-spawn timer.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ No wipe.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ 1K Weight per level.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ Anyone can imprint.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ dinos raise and imprint in SCS pods.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ Can capture dinos in combat using SCS pods.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ 12 Man tribe limit</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ Alliances allowed.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">✢ Declare war disabled.</>

content.title: <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~Extra Info!~•──◥</>
content.text:
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~LOOT DROPS!~•──◥</>

<TextStyle.LightBlue>White: Cosmetics</>
<TextStyle.LightBlue>White: Bonus: Rare Resources</>
<TextStyle.Green>Green: Consumables and Dye's</>
<TextStyle.Blue>Blue: Saddles</>
<TextStyle.Violet>Purple: Armor</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>Yellow: Weapons and Ammo</>
<TextStyle.Red>Red: Artifacts/Tributes and Color Tokens</>

<TextStyle.Orange>Buried Treasure: Saddle, Armor and Weapon Bp's ONLY BPS</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">All modded saddles, weapons, armor, cosmetics, and consumables should be included in the tables also.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~Weekend Boosted Rates!~•──◥</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">On weekends, we have some boosted rates for players to enjoy!</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">These last from 11pm Friday – 11pm Sunday (PST)</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">What are the boosts?</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">XP x2</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Player Harvest x2</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Dino Harvest x2</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Taming x1.3</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">These are x2 our normal rates, eg server xp rate is 2x, making the weekend 4x</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~Additional Settings and Info!~•──◥</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Offline Player Protection – PLAYERS AND DINOS CANNOT BE DAMAGED OFFLINE</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Tribes cannot mate with other tribes dinos unless allied</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Players cannot turn on/off other tribes structures (unless unlocked)</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Players cannot open the inventory of other tribes structures unless unlocked/pin coded</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Oil pumps and tree sap taps are auto unlocked</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Cannot drag offline players bodies unless allied</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Flyers cannot pickup non allies players</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Cannot pickup fertilized eggs belonging to another tribe</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Cannot pickup items belonging to another tribe unless allied</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Dropped wyvern eggs despawn after 60s if not incubating at an aircon or campfire</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">– These are in place to prevent griefing and stealing</>

content.title: <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~Useful Commands!~•──◥</>
content.text:
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">F1 – Open in-game shop</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">F2 – Open This Menu</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">F3 – Open Battlepass</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">/Giveengrams – Unlocks all engrams up to current level</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">/decaytime – Shows decay timer on a tribes structures</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">/farm – Enables solo farm</>

content.title: <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~General Rules!~•──◥</>
content.text:
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅰ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Do not use Human or 123 as a player or tribe name, if you accidentally do, please open a ticket to request a name change from a member of staff.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅱ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Clean up after yourself, this includes traps, old bases and Dinos.</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">If you find any of these things and wish to report to staff please report this in discord. If a tamed Dino is found and appears abandoned/lost we have a "lost property" channel in the discord server.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅲ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Do not use exploits, glitches, cheats or dupe items. These are banable offences. If you are a witness to any of the above acts please report to admin with photo/video evidence where possible.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅳ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">No griefing, kiting, trolling or stealing. If you are a witness to any of the above acts please report to admin using with photo/video evidence where possible.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅴ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Do not leave tames at any obelisk, all obelisks must remain open at all times for players wishing to enter boss fights. If a tame is found it may be admin-deleted.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅵ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Do not leave Dinos at other player bases without consent from the owner of the base, if the player objects and you are not available to move the Dino it may be admin-deleted.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅶ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Please keep the number of Dinos left outside of bases to a minimum, try and be conscious of lag. With the SCS mod any resource generating Dinos will produce resources while in the terminal.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅷ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Do not drop unwanted eggs from inventory, either eat them or use them for kibble crafting.</>

content.title: <RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~Building Rules!~•──◥</>
content.text:
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅰ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Bases must be no bigger than 300m x 300m – 2 bases per tribe per map – You can check the size of your base with the reusable tek spyglass.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Exceptions can be made for "base locations" like islands, ruins, plateaus, caves etc. If unsure make a ticket.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅱ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Bases must be at least 200m from any other player base from all sides.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅲ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Bases must not be built in any high resource or high Dino spawn areas.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅳ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Bases must not prevent other players from accessing artifact caves or explorer notes.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅴ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">If you build within a cave please clear it up after you are finished.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅵ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">If you build in a player spawn area please ensure there is a clear pathway out of your base that players can follow.</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅶ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">No base building on Oasisaur's (oasisuars must remain in a SCS pod when not in use – this is to help limit the amount of lag on a map)</>

<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">◤──•~RULE Ⅷ~•──◥</>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">No building in the surface enterances. Teleporters/outposts are fine in the blue entrance for metal farming.</>
